site.name: MyMadison
info.message.outdatedbrowser: You are using an outdated browser. Please upgrade your browser to improve your experience.
form.signup.title: Sign Up
form.signup.success: Welcome to Madison!  We just sent you an email.  Please click on the activation link to log in.
form.signup.error: There was an error signing you up. Please try again and let us know if you continue to receive this error.
form.login.title: Login
form.login.success: You have been logged in successfully
form.search.title: Search All Documents:
form.document.title.label: Title
form.document.category.label: Categories
form.document.sponsor.label: Sponsor
form.document.featured.confirm: Are you sure you want to change the featured document?
form.document.slug.label: Custom Url (slug)
form.document.slug.instructions: Only a through z (lowercase), 0 through 9, and hyphens (-) may be used. For example: my-document
form.document.status.label: Status
form.document.private.label: Private
form.document.private.help: If a document is private, it will not show up in search or lists, but can still be accessed by anyone who has the link to the document.
form.document.introtext.label: Intro Text
form.document.introtext.help: Markdown Friendly.  Auto-saves 3 seconds after you're done editing.
form.document.image.label: Image
form.document.image.help: Drag an image file here or click here to upload an image
form.document.image.title: Featured image
home.intro.title: Add your voice...
home.intro.text: Find legislation and regulations being developed and get informed. Then get involved and collaboratively craft the documents with the sponsors. To get started, choose from the recent documents below, or search the whole repository.
document.label.name: Name
document.label.updated: Updated <time class="published doc-updated-date" datetime="{{ datetime }}">{{datetime | parseDate | date:'mediumDate'}}</time>
document.label.updated.timeago: Updated <time class="published doc-updated-date" datetime="{{ datetime }}">{{ datetime | parseDate | timeAgo }}</time>
document.label.created: Posted <time class="created doc-created-date" datetime="{{ datetime }}">{{ datetime | parseDate | date:'mediumDate' }}</time>
document.label.created.timeago: Created <time class="created doc-updated-date" datetime="{{ datetime }}">{{ datetime | parseDate | timeAgo }}</time>
document.label.date.timeago: <time class="date" datetime="{{ datetime }}">{{ datetime | parseDate | timeAgo }}</time>
document.label.namedevent: {{ name }} on <time datetime="{{ datetime }}">{{ datetime | parseDate | date:'mediumDate' }}</time>
document.label.rss.title: Subscribe to RSS Feed
annotations.label.none: No annotations yet. Add your own!
user.label.membersince: Member since <time datetime="{{ datetime }}">{{ datetime | parseDate | date:'mediumDate' }}</time>
user.activity.message: Added {label, select, annotation{an} other{a}} { label } to the text of { title }
content.home.title: {{ title }} - Home
content.document.title: {{ title }} - {{ docTitle }}
content.intro.title: {{ title }} - Introduction
content.login.title: {{ title }} - Login
content.signup.title: {{ title }} - Signup
content.mydocuments.title: {{ title }} - My Documents
content.mydocuments.nodocsgroup: There are no documents for this group.
content.editdocument.title: {{ title }} - Edit Document
content.editdocument.savemessage: Document content saves automatically after 3 seconds.
content.editdocument.wordmessage: Need help converting a Microsoft Word document? There's a tool for that.
content.editdocument.markdownmessage: New to Markdown? Check out our <a href="/pdf/MarkdownCheatSheet.pdf" target="_blank">Markdown Cheat Sheet.
content.404.title: {{ title }} - Page not found.
content.404.body:
The page you requested is no longer here. It may have been removed, or the document may have been taken down by the author.

Try heading back to the home page and search for the document you were attempting to reach.

Think we made a mistake? Let us know if there should be something here!
errors.document.new.notitle: You must enter a document title to create a new document.
errors.document.new.general: There was an error submitting the document. Please try again later.
errors.document.new.permissions: You are not authorized to create documents. Go to the Account Settings page to request Independent Sponsor status or the Group Management page to create a group.
errors.document.edit.slug: There was an error updating the slug.
errors.document.edit.shorturl: There was an error generating your short url.
errors.document.edit.image: There was an error uploading the image.
errors.document.edit.imagerequired: You cannot delete the image of a Featured Document
errors.document.edit.unfeatured: Are you sure you want to unset this as the Featured Document?
errors.document.edit.multiplefeatured: A Featured Document is already set.  Are you sure you want to change the Featured Document?
